full_text: 02/10/2008 01:49 5616404420 X PAGE 01 Aileen Josephs, P.A. Attorney at Law 401 Clematis Street Suite 3000 West Palm Beach, Florida 33401 (561) 802-4111 Fax (561) 640-4422 E-Mail: JosephsA@aol.com http://www.ImmigrationUS.com http://www.MiniMundo.net Aileen Josephs Member of District of Columbia and Florida Bars February 10, 2008 TO: Mr. Guy Lewis RE: Mr. Epstein FROM: Aileen Josephs, Esq. Mr. Lewis: Women in our County have been watching this case with great concern. I strongly suggest you do not attack the victim(s). If you feel that your client has been defamed, as you mentioned in the February 7, 2008 Palm Beach Post article, you can file a libel suit- of course, the truth is an absolute defense to libel and please keep in mind that not knowing the age of a child is no defense to statutory rape or any sexual crime committed against a child. Sincerely, Aileen Josephs, Esq. cc: Ms. Lana Belohavek, Esq. State Attorney's Office Ms. La Tosha Lowe- request to place this letter in State's file Chief of Police- Palm Beach 07/26/17 Page 54 of 104 Public Records Request No.: 17-295 DOJ-OGR-00031671

I strongly suggest you do not attack the victim(s). additional_notes: The document is a letter from Aileen Josephs to Guy Lewis regarding Mr. Epstein. It contains a handwritten note 'Please place in file.' The document is part of a public records request.
